context:
### Idiom: 不卑不亢
### Meaning: 卑低、自卑；亢高傲。指对人有恰当的分寸，既不低声下气，也不傲慢自大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 在统一战线工作和对敌伪斗争中，牟宜之既能坚持政治立场，又善于团结各个阶层、各种地位的人士。有时虽置身危地亦义正词严侃侃而谈，不卑不亢毫无假借，同时能与各方各界保持过从与交谊。1946年5月，牟宜之奉调至东北辽东军区，先后任司令部秘书长和政治部联络部长。
target: In the united front work and the struggle against the enemy and the puppet, Moushizhi was able to uphold the political position as well as being good at uniting people of different classes and positions. Sometimes, although he was in a dangerous place, he spoke frankly and seriously, and was neither arrogant nor humble. At the same time, he was able to maintain a good relationship with people of various classes and positions. In May 1946, Moushizhi was transferred to the Northeast Liaoning Military Region and served as the chief secretary and the director of the Liaison Department of the Command Headquarters.

context:
### Idiom: 大地春回
### Meaning: 指冬去春来，草木萌生，大地上出现一片生机景象。有时亦用比喻形势好转。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 1971年新加坡文华大酒店敦请杨英风为他们进行整个室内的艺术设置，杨英风再度运用大理石材，设计完成了“朝元仙仗图”、“文华六器”(文华六器于2019年烧毁，后2022年修复完成) 等等一系列石雕系列，古典和现代并置，浪漫与尊贵并呈。1974年他再度为美国史波肯国际环境万国博览会中国馆设计外壁浮雕“大地春回”，及内壁浮雕 “凤凰屏”等。1951年，杨英风承受经济压力，只得从师大美术系辍学，并受到蓝荫鼎邀请开始在《丰年杂志》担任美术编辑，然而他在创作上仍相当勤劳；在11年的编辑工作中，他留下了大量的乡土版画和漫画。
target: In 1971, the Mandarin Orchard Hotel in Singapore invited Yang Yingfeng to design the entire interior art for them. Yang Yingfeng once again used marble materials to design the "Chaoyuan Immortal Battle Picture" and "Mandarin Six Ware" (Mandarin Six Ware was burned down in 2019 , the restoration will be completed in 2022) and a series of stone carving series, juxtaposing classic and modern, romantic and noble. In 1974, he once again designed the outer wall relief "Spring Return of the Earth" and the inner wall relief "Phoenix Screen" for the China Pavilion at the Spokane International Environmental Exposition in the United States. In 1951, Yang Yingfeng suffered from financial pressure and had to drop out of the Fine Arts Department of Normal University. He was invited by Lan Yinding to start working as an art editor for "Fengnian Magazine". However, he was still very diligent in creation; during 11 years of editing work, he A large number of local prints and comics were left behind.

### Idiom: 项庄舞剑
### Meaning: 比喻说话和行动的真实意图别有所指。同项庄舞剑，意在沛公”
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 并强调演习要有随时可投入战斗的‘今夜就战’的临战演练。这场美韩联合军演，表面上的假想敌是北韩，但是，鉴于演习地点紧逼辽东半岛和山东半岛，距离北京也还不到1000公里，势必造成中国有‘项庄舞剑，意在沛公’的威胁感。
target: It also emphasized that the drill should have a "fight tonight" pre-combat drill that can be put into battle at any time. On the surface, the imaginary enemy of this US-ROK joint military exercise is North Korea. However, given that the location of the exercise is close to the Liaodong Peninsula and Shandong Peninsula, and is less than 1,000 kilometers away from Beijing, it is bound to cause China to have Xiangzhuang dancing with swords, aiming at Peigong. 'sense of threat.

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: “摩羯”用“忙”来推开所有的约会，恨不得把一辈子的工作都拿出来忙完，为的就是尽快恢复单身。“天秤”渣的神不知鬼不觉，天秤会悄悄的厌倦，悄悄的找到新欢，悄悄的使用冷暴力逼你提分手。
target: Capricorns will use "busy" to avoid all dates, and they will be eager to finish all the work of their lifetime, just to get back to single life as soon as possible. Libra is a sly and cunning person, Libra will get bored, and will find a new lover, and use cold violence to force you to break up.

context:
### Idiom: 瞒上不瞒下
### Meaning: 瞒也作漫”，欺骗，蒙蔽。瞒着上面，不瞒下面。指通同作弊，不使上级知道。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: “外面工作”主要是在两军驻防交接地带“利用我们的宣传品、喊话、谈话、联欢、慰劳、演剧等等方式，去影响东北军”，中共中央明确要求改变先前那种标语口号式的“高谈阔论使人厌烦的宣传”，要多多利用演剧等“普遍深入、通俗简明”的宣传鼓动方法。要“加紧最有把握方面的下层官兵工作”，使用各种文艺形式，“动员所有的我们的战斗员、游击队员、赤少队员、机关工作人员，同他们中下级官兵举行谈话、宣传、联欢、唱歌、演戏，把他们当作自家人，同他们各单位甚至一连、一排、一班进行瞒上不瞒下的协商，敷衍上级进攻命令，……这样把六十七军从政治上转变为可靠的抗日军”“内面工作”就是在东北军中建立中共党组织为基础“在东北军中创立坚强的领导的核心”，从而“使东北军的下层官兵在抗日救国的政治目标下团结起来，给东北军造成一个坚强的下层基础与推动的力量”，推动高级将领乃至于整个东北军成为抗日友军。周恩来亲自指导中央东北军工作委员会成立东北军工作干部训练班，并把在劳山战役、榆林桥战役、直罗镇战役中俘虏的东北军3个师的中下级军官120余人，集中在瓦窑堡开办学习班（即“白军军官连”），毛泽东、博古、邓颖超、彭德怀等中央领导亲自讲课，发路费送回东北军。
target: "Outside work" mainly involves "using our propaganda materials, shouting, talking, entertainment,慰劳, plays, etc., to influence the Northeastern Army" in the border areas between the two armies. The Central Committee clearly requires changing the previous slogan-style "boring propaganda" and making more use of plays and other "popular and simple" propaganda and mobilization methods. It should "strengthen the work with lower-ranking officers in the most promising areas" and use various forms of art to "mobilize all our fighters, guerillas, Red Youth members, and staff members to talk, propaganda, entertainment, singing, and plays with their lower-ranking officers, treating them as family members and holding secret consultations with them, even down to the company, platoon, and squad levels, to deceive the上级 and evade the上级 orders... This way, the 67th Army can be transformed politically into a reliable anti-Japanese army." "Inside work" involves establishing the Communist Party of China's organizational base in the Northeastern Army and creating a strong core of leadership, so that "the lower-ranking officers of the Northeastern Army can unite under the political goal of抗日救国, creating a strong lower-level foundation and driving force for the Northeastern Army", and pushing senior officers and even the entire Northeastern Army to become抗日友军.周恩来 personally directed the establishment of the Northeastern Army Work Committee and set up an officer training class for the Northeastern Army, and sent more than 120 middle and low-ranking officers from the three Northeastern Army divisions captured in the Laoshan Campaign, Yulin Bridge Campaign, and Zhiluo Town Campaign to the Wazhuangbu study class (i.e., the "White Army Officer Company"), where they were taught by top Central leaders such as毛泽东, Bo Gu, Deng Yingchao, and Peng Dehuai and given travel expenses to return to the Northeastern Army.

### Idiom: 玉树琼枝
### Meaning: ①形容树木华美。②比喻贵家子弟。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

target: Add a touch of spring color to your home! Feel the joy of the New Year among the flowers | Daily news. The branches of the jade tree sway gently. The All-China Federation of Trade Unions allocated 396 million yuan in central financial funds.

### Idiom: 利市三倍
### Meaning: 利市利润；三倍几倍。形容买卖得到的利润极多。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 星期一，一路顺风，星期二，二目有神，星期三，利市三倍，星期四，四平八稳，星期五，五指抓钱，星期六，六腑清畅，星期天，洪福齐天。
target: On Monday, the wind is favorable, on Tuesday, the two eyes are bright, on Wednesday, three times the profit, on Thursday, steady and stable, on Friday, the five fingers grasp money, on Saturday, the six viscera are clear, on Sunday, the blessings of the world and the heavens.

context:
### Idiom: 累教不改
### Meaning: 经过多次教育仍然不改正。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 党员少交、不交党费，支部书记应承担起引导教育、督促整改的责任，对拒不履行缴纳党费的党员要严肃处理，对“无正当理由，连续6个月不缴纳党费”或缴纳党费不足额，且累教不改的，坚决按照《党章》规定进行处置，确保党费收缴的严肃性。近来，长乐区结合“两学一做”学习教育、党费收缴工作专项检查，在开展党费收缴工作中，及时下发《中共中央组织部关于中国共产党党费收缴、使用和管理的规定》、《关于党费收缴工作专项检查几个具体问题的答复》、《中组部办公厅关于在规范党费收缴管理工作中对离退休干部、职工党员交纳党费问题的答复》等相关文件，部署各基层党组织严格按照上级要求，引导全区党员不断增强党员的党性意识和组织观念，进一步规范和加强党费收缴工作。
target: Party members who do not pay or pay less than the amount should be subject to the Party Secretary's responsibility of guiding education and supervision, and seriously handle those who refuse to perform the duty of paying party fees, and those who pay for party fees without proper reasons and with no improvement after being instructed. Recently, the Longyan District has combined the “two studies and one action” learning education with the party fund collection and use and management special inspection, and issued the “Regulations of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on Party Fund Collection, Use and Management”, the “Reply to Several Specific Issues on Party Fund Collection Special Inspection” and the “Reply of the General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on Party Fund Collection and Use Management for the Retired and Retired Staff Members”, and deployed the local party organizations to strictly abide by the requirements of the above documents, guide the party members to continuously enhance their party spirit and organizational awareness, and further standardize and improve the party fund collection work.

### Idiom: 不卑不亢
### Meaning: 卑低、自卑；亢高傲。指对人有恰当的分寸，既不低声下气，也不傲慢自大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 每天面对长官欺凌、新生间打小报告。绝望之际，眼见陈萍的强烈求生意志，与严水霞于苦难中的不卑不亢，以及与林耀辉萌芽中的爱情，杏惠重拾信念。同时，处部发起“一人一事良心救国运动”，引起新生反抗。
target: I face bullying from superiors and snitches among freshmen every day. In despair, Xinghui regained her faith after witnessing Chen Ping's strong will to survive, Yan Shuixia's neither humbleness nor arrogance in suffering, and her budding love with Lin Yaohui. At the same time, the Ministry of Education launched the "One Person, One Action, Conscience Movement to Save the Nation," which aroused new resistance.

context:
### Idiom: 成家立业
### Meaning: 成立家庭，建立家业。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: web
source: 农村不动产证一般是在办理后的2-3个月就发放。农村人口也是有流动性的，有很多其他地方的人通过搬迁、结亲等形式到农村建造房屋，成家立业。自2020年以来，全国各地随着农村土地确权工作的开始，也对农村宅基地进行了确权工作：办理农村版本的房产证，就是农村集体土地使用权证书或不动产权证书，在证书上权利类型标准宅基地使用权和房屋所有权，以此保障农村房屋权利。
target: The rural real estate certificate is usually issued within 2-3 months after the completion of processing. The rural population is also mobile, and many people from other places have moved to rural areas to build houses, establish families, and establish households. Since 2020, rural land has been confirmed in various places across the country, and the rural residential land has also been confirmed: the rural version of the property certificate is a rural collective land use right certificate or immovable property certificate. The right type of the property is the right to use the rural land and the right to own the house, in order to protect the rights of rural houses.

context:
### Idiom: 不知所错
### Meaning: 错错开；处置。不知道怎么办才好。形容处境为难或心神慌乱。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 绝大部分朋友应该是第一次买房子，到了交房日，很是兴奋，往往会不知所错，碰到的问题：怎么验收房;交房手续是什么;交房要付多少钱;碰到房子问题怎么办;什么是房子质量问题等等。（二）墙体内的空鼓问题 墙体表面与内层墙体之间存在的空鼓问题是无法用肉眼去查看的，可以通过敲击墙面通过墙面发出的声音进行判断，若果发出“咚咚”的声音说明，内部存在空鼓，若果是承重墙，则房屋存在严重质量问题；若是非承重墙，需要重新处理墙面，即重新挂网、挂浆等处理，否则在装修完毕一段时间后会出现墙体表面会向外凸出，轻则出现裂痕，重则墙皮掉落；若果发出“啪啪”的清脆的响声，说明表面与墙体之间存在细微的缝隙，不需要修补处理，在刮腻子时找平即可。
target: Most of my friends are buying a house for the first time. When the day of handover comes, they are very excited and often don’t know what they are doing. Problems they encounter include: how to inspect and accept the house; what are the handover procedures; how much does it cost to hand over the house; and problems with the house. What to do; what are the house quality problems, etc. (2) The hollow problem in the wall. The hollow problem between the wall surface and the inner wall cannot be seen with the naked eye. It can be judged by the sound emitted by tapping the wall. If it is The sound of "dong dong" indicates that there is a hollow inside. If it is a load-bearing wall, the house has serious quality problems; if it is a non-load-bearing wall, the wall needs to be reprocessed, that is, re-hanging netting, hanging grout, etc., otherwise it will After the decoration is completed for a period of time, the surface of the wall will bulge outwards, ranging from cracks to the wall covering falling off. If there is a crisp sound of "popping", it means there is a slight gap between the surface and the wall. Gaps do not need to be repaired, just level them when applying putty.

### Meaning: 薪柴草。抱着柴草去救火。比喻用错误的方法去消除灾祸，结果使灾祸反而扩大。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 好痛苦因为不想被剧透，所以每次想看消失的她的预告的时候就看一遍zyj预告解馋，新概念抱薪救火。
target: It's so painful not to be spoiled so I watch Zyj previews every time I want to see the preview of Missing her. New concepts throw the flame out.

### Idiom: 一天一地
### Meaning: 满天满地。形容到处都是。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 订口为轴对称。采用书眉交叉倒错的方法，根据人的视线一般从幅左下方朝右上移动的规律，双码书眉排在地脚，单码书眉排在天头，一天一地，左右交错，全书书眉间隔倒错，耐人寻味。以订口为轴的对称版式，外分内合，张敛有致，或造成版面、开本的扩张，或加强向心力的聚敛，有衡稳之效。
target: The headband is symmetrical about the axis. Using the method of interlacing headbands, according to the law that people's vision generally moves from the left bottom of the page to the right top, double headbands are placed at the foot and single headbands are placed at the top, day and night, interlacing left and right, and the headbands of the whole book are interlaced, which is interesting. The symmetrical layout about the axis of the headband, outer division and inner combination, tension and relaxation, can either expand the layout and format, or strengthen the convergence force, and has the effect of balance and stability.

context:
### Idiom: 慈悲为本
### Meaning: 慈悲慈善和怜悯。原佛教语，以恻隐怜悯之心为根本。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 同时，作为国内财产保险机动车辆保险领域的主要专家，翻译多部国外学术著作，开设专业课程，培养专业人才，为国内机动车辆保险的科学化、现代化作出了贡献。他的思想主张以仁政为本，以慈悲为本，以礼义为本，以和谐为本，以爱国为本，以节俭为本，以宽容为本，以谦虚为本，以智慧为本，以勤勉为本，以善良为本，以正义为本，以和平为本，以自由为本，以平等为本，以友爱为本，以和谐为本，以自强为本，以自信为本，以自尊为本，以自立为本，以自强不息为本，以自由自在为本，以自由平等为本，以自由友爱为本，以自由和谐为本，以自由自信为本，以自由自尊为本，以自由自立为本，以自由自强不息为本。弟弟袁驷，是清华大学土木工程专业教授。
target: At the same time, as a leading expert in the field of domestic property insurance for motor vehicles, he has translated multiple foreign academic works, offered professional courses, cultivated professional talents, and made contributions to the scientific and modern development of domestic motor vehicle insurance. His philosophy advocates benevolence, compassion, righteousness, harmony, patriotism, thrift, tolerance, humility, wisdom, diligence, kindness, justice, peace, freedom, equality, fraternity, harmony, self-improvement, self-confidence, self-esteem, self-reliance, perseverance, freedom, equality, fraternity, harmony, self-confidence, self-esteem, self-reliance, and tireless self-improvement. His younger brother, Yuan Si, is a professor of civil engineering at Tsinghua University.

### Idiom: 磨穿铁鞋
### Meaning: 形容长途跋涉，历尽艰辛。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 成语反义词藏头露尾诗： 一、水磨功夫 二、粗枝大叶 水磨功夫分精粗， 粗枝大叶易失败，（败） 磨穿铁鞋攀高枝； 枝别条异讲怪事；（事） 功劳汗马莫贪大， 大失人望成乌有，（有） 夫子自道如贞叶。叶散冰离无遗余。
target: Idiom Antonyms Hiding the Head and Showing the Tail Poem: 1. Water-grinding skill 2. Coarse branches and big leaves Water-grinding skill can be fine or coarse, Coarse branches and big leaves are easy to fail, (fail) Wear out iron shoes to climb high branches; Branches and leaves are different and tell strange things, (things) Don't be greedy for great achievements and hard work, Great disappointment will make it nothing, (nothing) The master speaks like a faithful leaf. The leaves scatter and the ice separates without leaving anything behind.

context:
### Idiom: 云淡风轻
### Meaning: 微风轻拂，浮云淡薄。形容天气晴好。亦作风轻云淡”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 怎么说好？那只是茶杯里的风波。事后他说得云淡风轻，今年1月有报道指，Visit Saudi赞助女足世界杯的交易接近落实，如非女足球员站起来一面倒大力反对，后果难以想像。正如阿仙奴荷兰巨星美迪玛形容，FIFA应为曾考虑这种交易‘感到非常羞耻’，一个近乎没有女权的国度，赞助女足世界杯，实在十分讽刺，幸好最终没有发生。
target: How to put it? That was just a storm in a teacup. He downplayed it afterwards. In January this year, it was reported that the deal for Visit Saudi to sponsor the Women's World Cup was close to being finalized. If it weren't for the female footballers who stood up and unanimously opposed it, the consequences would be unimaginable. As described by the Dutch superstar Medima of Arsenal, FIFA should feel 'very ashamed' for even considering such a deal. It's extremely ironic for a country with almost no women's rights to sponsor the Women's World Cup, luckily, it did not happen in the end.

context:
### Idiom: 富国强民
### Meaning: 指使国家富足，民力强盛。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 6岁起，陈望道在分水塘当地私塾学习“四书五经”。16岁时，进入义乌县城的绣湖书院学习，之后赴金华府立中学堂（浙江省立第七中学校）学习数理化等现代科学知识四年，他“以为欧美的科学发达，要兴办实业，富国强民，不得不借助欧美科学”，毕业后便积极为留学欧美做准备。1913年赴上海一所补习学校补习英语，之后考入杭州之江大学学习数学和英语。
target: From the age of 6, Chen Wangdao studied the "Four Books and Five Classics" in a local private school in Fenshuitang. At the age of 16, he entered Xiuhu Academy in Yiwu County, and then went to Jinhua Prefectural Middle School (Zhejiang Provincial No. 7 Middle School) to study modern scientific knowledge such as mathematics, physics, and chemistry for four years. He "thought that science in Europe and the United States was developed, and it was necessary to establish industries and enrich the country." To strengthen the people, we have to rely on European and American science." After graduation, he actively prepared to study in Europe and the United States. In 1913, he went to a cram school in Shanghai to learn English, and then was admitted to Hangzhou Zhijiang University to study mathematics and English.

### Idiom: 处高临深
### Meaning: 处高处在显贵重要地位。临深如临深渊。处在显贵之位，好比面临深渊。旧时指官职高了常有危险性。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 先前，黄门侍郎扬雄做过一篇〈酒箴〉，用以规劝汉成帝，该篇文章藉酒客诘难正人君子的口吻，用器物作比喻写成，文中写道：“子犹瓶矣。观瓶之居，居井之眉，处高临深，动常近危。酒醪不入口，臧水满怀，不得左右，牵于𬙊徽。”
target: Previously, Yang Xiong, the Yellow Gate Attendant, wrote a piece called "The Wine Admonition" to advise Han Chengdi. This article was written in the form of a dialogue between a wine guest and a righteous person, using vessels as metaphors. In it, it was written: "You are like a bottle. Consider where the bottle is placed: at the edge of the well, high and deep, always close to danger. The wine does not enter your mouth, but the water inside is full and you cannot move left or right, pulled by the thread."

### Idiom: 买东买西
### Meaning: 指买各种物品。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: cc-news
source: 德国主要反对党领袖呼吁就中国关系应该建立欧洲阵线。保守派基民盟党魁弗里德里希·梅尔茨在接受路透社采访时表示，德国不能再依赖从俄罗斯购买廉价天然气和从世界各地买东买西，同时又依赖美国的安全保护。自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰暴露出欧洲对俄罗斯能源的严重依赖危机以来，梅尔茨的评论反映了德国对中国政策在日益反思。
target: The leader of Germany's main opposition party has called for the establishment of a European front on relations with China. Friedrich Merz, leader of the conservative Christian Democratic Union, said in an interview with Reuters that Germany can no longer rely on buying cheap natural gas from Russia and purchasing goods from around the world, while also depending on U.S. security protection. Since the crisis of Europe's heavy dependence on Russian energy was exposed by Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Merz's comments reflect Germany's increasing rethinking of its policy towards China.

### Meaning: ①表面上声言攻打东面，其实是攻打西面。军事上使敌人产生错觉的一种战术。语出《通典·兵六》：“声言击东，其实击西。”②形容动作、说话、行文等变化莫测。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

source: 在曼达洛人的声东击西下，海盗母舰最后被击落，为Nevarro星球解围。
target: Under the mandolin, the pirates' mainship was finally sunk, freeing the planet Nevarro.

### Idiom: 昏迷不省
### Meaning: 神志昏沉，不省人事。同昏迷不醒”。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 至中午12时许，卫生署人员到场接走老翁，送他返回蓝田寓所继续接受家居隔离。2022年1月4日，清平楼一名女户主返回住所后，发现22岁女儿房间上锁，其后强行人房后发现已经昏迷不省人事。。而救护员亦在房间内发现另一名20岁已经失去知觉的女子，经检查后，证实两名女子当场身亡。
target: Around 12 noon, personnel from the Health Bureau arrived to take the old man away and sent him back to his residence in Lam Tin to continue his home quarantine. On January 4, 2022, a female homeowner returned to her residence in Qingping Building and found her 22-year-old daughter's room locked. After forcibly entering the room, she found her daughter unconscious. Ambulance staff also found another 20-year-old woman in the room who had lost consciousness. After examination, it was confirmed that both women had died on the spot.

### Idiom: 无情无义
### Meaning: 没有情义。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 而纲吉既不保证武士们的家门土地（改易减封），甚至严格考察蒙祖上余荫世袭某一官职的武士（整顿吏治），旦有懈怠不作为即施以惩戒。如此改革，对于武士而言自然是无情无义无理取闹的，如此主君，自然是不合格的、荒唐的。他们没有意识到的是，纲吉的自我定位首先是“国君”，其次才是“主君”。
target: However, Tsunayoshi did not guarantee the family land of the warriors (changed the title to reduce the title), and even strictly inspected the warriors who inherited a certain official position from the Mongolian ancestor Yu Yin (rectified the official administration), and punished them if they were slack and inactive. Such a reform would naturally be ruthless, unjust and unreasonable for the warriors, and such a master would naturally be unqualified and absurd. What they didn't realize was that Tsuna's self-positioning was first and foremost the "king of the country", and secondly the "lord".

### Idiom: 河水不洗船
### Meaning: 比喻不相干或相安无事。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: weibo
source: 清·吴敬梓《儒林外史》第十四回：“我是一片本心，特地来报信，我也只愿得无事，落得“河水不洗船”。
target: Qing Dynasty writer Wu Jingzi's "Outlaws of the Marsh": "I came here with the best intentions to deliver this message. I just hope everything turns out well, so that it won't be like 'the river doesn't wash the boat'."

### Idiom: 万马奔腾
### Meaning: ①无数匹马奔跑跳跃。②常用以形容声势浩大、气魄宏伟、进展迅速等情状。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: web
source: 看那绿油油的麦苗，在春风的吹拂下翻成一道道麦浪，仿佛向我招手致意;风中旗声猎猎，麦浪滚滚，又如万马奔腾，那份自豪的心情简直无法言语!巨大的责任感就会在心底涌动，升腾!依偎春天是那样的富有活力、生命力，一点丝毫不起眼的绿，一片欣然张开的红，就能使他们的心灵发亮，春天对于热爱它的人，无时无刻不在散发着一股神奇的魔力和生命力。
target: Look at the lush green wheat seedlings, rolling into waves under the caress of the spring breeze, as if waving and greeting me; the flags rustle in the wind, the waves of wheat surge, like thousands of horses galloping, the pride in my heart is simply beyond words! A tremendous sense of responsibility will surge from the bottom of my heart! Embracing spring is so full of vitality and life force, a bit of unremarkable green, a piece of joyfully blooming red, can make their souls shine. For those who love spring, it is always exuding a magical power and life force.

### Idiom: 反面教员
### Meaning: 反面坏的，消极的一面。指与人民为敌的人的言行，可以从反面教育人民。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**
Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 至于可能会被人卡脖子，也是要记住心里。反面教员的存在是好事，提醒我们还要努力，不能骄傲。GDP上去了，又有嘲笑人均值，那就再努力就是了。
target: As for the possibility of being choked by others, it is also something to keep in mind. The existence of negative examples is a good thing, reminding us that we still need to work hard and cannot be arrogant. If the GDP goes up and people mock the per capita value, then we just need to work harder.
